name: Bike Atv Race: OffRoad Stunt 2
description:
Bike Atv Race: OffRoad Stunt - The Ultimate Challenge is a racing game with awesome , ATV Vehicle thrilling graphic designs, rocking musical score, and beautiful game scenes.

Bike Atv Race: OffRoad Stunt has been designed for people of all ages and is especially optimized for iPhone 8, iPhone 7, iPhone 6 , iPhone 6 plus and iPhone 5S.

This game has beautiful locations and tracks that will test your driving skills of a Bike Atv Race: OffRoad Stunt .

This game is designed to test your problem solving skills. You need the combination of right speed and tilt control to overcome the each unique hurdle. Enjoy!

Download and Enjoy the Amazing Stunts .
